bibl.title: Back to Oegstgeest. The von Scherling Papyrus Collection. Some von Scherling Texts in Minnesota. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Part 1. The von Scherling Papyrus Collection [K.A.W.]. - Part 2. Some von Scherling Texts in Minnesota: 1. P. Minnesota Inv. 4. Declaration to a strategus of the Oxyrhynchite nome. Oxyrhynchus, AD 89 - 93/4 [K.A.W.]; - 2. Inv. 5. Receipt for the return of some marriage goods. Provenance unknown, III AD [K.A.W.]; - 3. Inv. 11. Request for the payment for πυρὸς συναγοραστικός. Oxyrhynchus, AD 99/100 [M.J.B.]; - 4. Inv. 12. Receipt for the price of green fodder. Provenance unknown, AD 120/1 [K.A.W.]; - 5. Inv. 13. Declaration of exemption from prosecution. Provenance unknown, AD 140/1 [K.A.W.]; - 6. Inv. 16. Fragments of two (?) epikrisis applications. Oxyrhynchus, in / after AD 188/9 [K.A.W.]; - 7. Inv. 17. Declaration of exemption from prosecution. Provenance unknown, 5 May AD 191 [A.V.B.]; - 8. Inv. 19. Fragment of a regnal formula on leather. Provenance unknown, AD 256-260 [M.J.B.]; - 9. Inv. 20. Fragment of an official letter or petition. Oxyrhynchus?, AD 304-307 [M.J.B.]; - 10. Inv. 21. Beginning of a document. Oxyrhynchus, 29 October - 27 November AD 443 [K.A.W.]; - 11. O. Minnesota Inv. 1. Receipt. Southern Thebaid?, AD V-VI [K.A.W.].
bibl.seg: BAKKER Marja, Alette BAKKERS and Klaas WORP, Back to Oegstgeest. The von Scherling Papyrus Collection. Some von Scherling Texts in Minnesota. Avec résumé en anglais.

Provenance unknown, 5 May AD 191 [A.V.B.]; - 8. Inv. 19. Fragment of a regnal formula on leather. Provenance unknown, AD 256-260 [M.J.B.]; - 9. Inv. 20. Fragment of an official letter or petition. Oxyrhynchus?, AD 304-307 [M.J.B.]; - 10. Inv. 21. Beginning of a document. Oxyrhynchus, 29 October - 27 November AD 443 [K.A.W.]; - 11. O. Minnesota Inv. 1. Receipt.
